title: What is the Advanced Course in Russia and how does it teach non-verbal hypnotism and the use of ecstasy in therapy?
first_phrase: This text provides details about an advanced course that was held in Russia aimed at learning the therapeutic potential of ecstasy. The course deepens the knowledge of techniques from first-level courses and incorporates various methods of inducing crisis and hypnotism. The participants learned about non-verbal therapy, including regression techniques and magnetism for well-being. The course also touched on some quantum and hermetic paradigms and included exercises for self-hypnosis. The text highlights a specific process called Taurus, known for its ability to induce deep hypnosis quickly. Finally, the author delves into the advanced version of Taurus that was practiced in the course, which includes light, passes, and regression.
content: PROGRAM AND SYNTHESIS OF THE ADVANCED COURSE DONE IN RUSSIA Goal of the course: Learning what ecstasy is and how can be of benefit in therapy Deepen the techniques of the first level and in specific learn different methods of inducing crisis Learning a specific framework called non verbal hypnotism using also the power of sound to induce a state With non verbal hypnotism and ecstasy combined create deep trances Learning the basis of a non verbal therapy where we do regressions in an "evocative" way using just non verbal communication Magnetism techniques for well being Some Quantum and Hermetic Paradigms Many exercises of self hypnosis (with the mirror, with water with movement) 1st day =========================================NOT DONE IN ROME (general demo Taurus - Movement - Ecstasy What is TAURUS? Taurus is the name of a very powerful technique that can induce deep hypnosis fast in everyone BENEFITS: it can induce deep trances and somnambulism fast, it can be done with groups, it introduces the client to open up METHOD: It is based on a specific breathingand instructions For explanation of Taurus see the slide LEVEL 1) LEVEL 2 In the advanced course we do these elemnts more than what on the slide: we add LIGHT we add PASSES and we work with a regression.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the advanced course done in Russia aimed to deepen the techniques of inducing crisis, learn about non-verbal hypnotism and ecstasy, and teach the basics of non-verbal therapy, magnetic therapy, and hermetic paradigms. Participants were exposed to several exercises such as Taurus, Magnetic Circle, Mirror Exercise, Spine Healing Exercise, and more. Additionally, participants were trained on how to equalize magnetic force and gave an introduction to non-verbal communication. Through these techniques, participants could induce deep hypnosis, create a physiological state, and promote well-being.
